name: Zeke's Convergence

passives.name: Frostfire Tempest
passives.effects: Upon casting your ultimate ability, you summon a storm of flame and ice around you for 5 seconds, dealing{{ft|{{as|{{ap|30/4}} magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds|{{as|{{ap|30*5}} '''total''' magic damage}} over the duration}}to enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 350 units and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 30% (45 second cooldown, starts on ultimate cast).

effects_structured.raw: Upon casting your ultimate ability, you summon a storm of flame and ice around you for 5 seconds, dealing{{ft {{as {{ap 30/4}} magic damage}} every {{fd 0.25}} seconds {{as {{ap 30*5}} '''total''' magic damage}} over the duration}}to enemies within {{tip cr icononly=true}} 350 units and {{tip slow slowing}} them by 30% (45 second cooldown, starts on ultimate cast).

simpleDescription: Grants you and your ally bonuses when you cast your ultimate.
